Dear Leota,
Sir,
We have acknowledged your response with thanks and all your vital questions

However please note that ( FAC) Finance Conduct Authority are responsible
for managing,delivering and transfer funds which are totally distressed in
the system as a of result of delays and outright mis Conduct from some
banks and some financial institutions .
It is imperative you go through our profile online to understand very well
our competency and our integrity when it comes to financial matters. Iam
assuring you that with FAC Finance Conduct Authority this transaction will
100% hitch free .
You funds transfer has been delayed for a while and all the details where
made available to us through the Bristish government officials.
Your personal information is highly important to enable us recognise and

funds, also during the funds remittance into your bank account details that
everything must accurate and correct to avoid any mistake.
Upon conclusion of this transaction and also funds transfer into your bank
account this organisation will remove all his personal information date
from our systems.
We appreciate your good efforts and kind understanding.
Best Regards.
Nikhli Rathi
Chief executive officer.

SUBJECT: Re: For your urgent attention
Hello Sir,
This is a reminder for the message I sent to you few days ago and iam

I received your message with thanks for your great understanding and good

Meanwhile, I have perfectly understand the situation of things with you.

successfully either by bank to bank transfer or by through diplomatic
courier service delivery to your door step , since the bank officials are
not 100% honest to give a better and good interest rate, you better make
the best choice.
This amount available for you presently in our system are the sum of
$10.5Million United States dollars USD with this money you can assist your
grandchild have a better life and asist her to buy new house for her better
future.
The funds has been on database system with your name and your email address
as the beneficiary. Please note that at of failure to make this payment
into your bank account then the government will seized it or confiscate the
funds, they choose any charity homes available at this disposal to transfer
the funds for welfare. Therefore there is no name of such charity homes at
the moment.
It is very fair for the situation that we work together in other to
conclude everything about this transaction ,so that these funds will be
released into your bank account or through courier services delivery to
your address.
WHAT  I will like you do next are as follows:
 1.  You to send me your bank account details where you like to receive
this funds transfer.
2. You have to send me your home address
3. Send me your valid ID copy .
4.  Also make your best choice on how you will like to receive your funds
transfer either through bank to bank transfer  or through courier service
delivery.
Thanks for your understanding and cooperation.
Best Regards.
 Nikhli Rathi.
Chief executive officer
